definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Lengthen the tailbone away from the back of your pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 拉長尾椎骨遠離盆骨的後側。

sentences.english: Adhere to the caudal extension back, and fingers extended upward.
sentences.chinese: 堅持尾椎向後延伸，同時指尖往上延伸。

sentences.english: The coccyx is the remnant of what was once a human tail.
sentences.chinese: 尾椎骨是我們曾經有的那條長尾巴的遺蹟。

sentences.english: An extensive sacrococcygeal chordoma is considered a challenge for neurosurgeons.
sentences.chinese: 廣泛性骶尾椎脊索瘤被認爲是神經外科的挑戰。

sentences.english: Then inhale and lift the torso up by pulling the tailbone down and into the pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 然後吸氣，通過拉尾椎骨進入盆骨的方式擡起軀幹。

sentences.english: Treat ache of long - term knee joint and end vertebra how effectively to get injured by fall?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣有效治療長期膝關節疼痛和尾椎骨跌傷？

sentences.english: Tail bushy, with the last vertebra extended at least to the hock joint.
sentences.chinese: 毛髮濃密，尾椎至少延伸到飛節。

sentences.english: This Yoga pose requires you to balance on the tripod of your sitting bones and tailbone.
sentences.chinese: 這個瑜伽體式要求用坐骨和尾椎骨支撐身體保持平衡。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (bone at the base of the spine)
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
